tool_description: Creates detailed timetables for transit routes based on optimized frequencies, travel times, and operational constraints.

headways.description: Service headways in minutes for each route

travel_times.description: End-to-end travel times for each route in minutes

error_messages: Array length mismatch: route_ids, headways, and travel_times must have equal lengths.
Invalid time format: Use HH:MM format for departure times with first_departure < last_departure.
Invalid headway values: Headways must be positive numbers between 1-120 minutes.
Invalid travel times: Travel times must be positive numbers greater than 0.
usage: Provide route identifiers with corresponding headways and travel times. Set service span with first and last departure times. Returns complete timetables.

departure_times.description: All departure times in HH:MM format

total_trips.description: Total number of scheduled trips across all routes
